title: The Zodiac Saree Shopping Guide To Turn Your Style Around
text:
By Nagma Hasan January 30, 2017 
You may have noticed that every time you go shopping you end up snagging similar style sarees, or may be a particular colour that always catches your attention, or a quirky print that rules your decision. And then one day when you open your wardrobe, you realise that you have your own signature style. How did that happen? Well, it is your zodiac sign that somehow dictates your sartorial choices. So why bother browsing through loads of sarees, when you can simply use this zodiac saree shopping guide to help you pick the perfect saree? 
Aries 
The fiery personality that she is, red is her ultimate choice. Despite the bold colour, she likes to keep the silhouette understated. Lehenga sarees with minimal embellishments is what suit her personality best. 
Taurus 
Comfort fashion defines a Taurian in the truest way. She loves bold colours and has a special love for texture. She likes to don her saree in the traditional way because it is easy to carry. She effortlessly matches her simple sarees with eye-popping blouses that give her that unique style. 
Gemini 
Quirky as ever, the Gemini woman can be feminine one day and edgy the next. She loves bold prints, pop colours and layering. Pant sarees or dhoti sarees reflect her vibrant personality just as well as a retro drape would, always highlighting her fun style. 
Cancer 
The Cancerian woman is a homebird, attached to her traditions. She is all about femininity, soft fabrics in lace, silk or liquid jersey even. Lehenga sarees, light embroidered lace sarees with delicate cape blouses in taupe, red and ivory are her quintessential choices. 
Leo 
A lioness in her own right, a Leo woman loves attention and makes sure she gets it. For her, the brighter the better. She makes metallics, golds, yellows with bold prints, or heavily embroidered sarees do the talking for her. A lace or net saree teamed with a backless choli would certainly bring out her sexy side. 
Virgo 
The Virgo woman is the epitome of femininity. She is not only ladylike, but also likes to add a twist to her style. A belted saree or a pallu wrapped around her neck adds a sense of uniqueness to her style. She loves blues and greens, and florals and soft prints are her favourite.

Libra 
A complete people’s person, the Libra woman loves company and that’s why juggling a feminine style with an edgy one is no trouble for her. She loves pastels just as much as darker hues. One day she means business, draping a saree with a conservative jacket blouse, another day she is playful as hell with a flirty blouse and a chiffon saree. 
Scorpio 
She is known for her passion and intensity and not showing that in her style would be a crime. Edgy and classy defines her style best. Velvets, embroidered net or lace and georgette in scarlet, wine or magenta will do the trick. A saree worn with leather pants will keep her aesthetic in the right order. 
Sagittarius 
She is versatile and free-spirited, and so are her sartorial choices. She loves all colours, prints and styles. Oceanic hues in turquoise, lavender, green and blue are her favourite. Indo-western fusion sarees work well for her flamboyant personality. 
Capricorn 
Pragmatic as hell, the Capricorn woman is a conservative dresser. She seeks comfort clothing and understated colours. Dark hues in indigo, maroon and black are her first choices. Cotton sarees with wide borders or a traditional Kanjeevaram or Banarasi saree is something she would appreciate. 
Aquarius 
Breezy and detached as she is, The Aquarius woman loves her fashion to be out of the blue. She avoids loud hues, and eye-soothing colours are what she will choose any day. Their style aesthetic revolves around delicate and feminine embellishments, dreamy fabrics in lace, chiffon and net. 
Pisces 
Piscean women are simpletons and like to keep it minimal. Cool tones of green, blue, lemon and pink splashed on lehenga sarees and mermaid sarees are easy for them to carry off. 
So, what are you waiting for? Next time you go shopping, keep your rashi in mind and aim for the stars to snag the best saree for yourself.
